name: MNC - Inspiring Success (Previously Mission Neighborhood Centers, Inc.)
description: MNC delivers culturally sensitive, multi-generational, community-based services across educational programs, homelessness prevention, and social services. MNC develops and promotes leadership skills that empower families to build strong, healthy and vibrant neighborhoods. Clients are predominantly Latino, African American, Russian, and Asian families living in San Francisco’s Mission, Excelsior, Mission Bay, and Bayview Districts.
